data.actual_result: Message gets duplicated and spammed while “send” button stays lightened
data.expected_result: Message should only send once and send button shouldn’t light up
data.short_description: Same message gets re-send (spammed) when u leave the app open and come back later. {**Note**} Do give this a few times!
data.steps_to_repro: - Force close discord - open the app - Have the app open in a text channel  - Tap on the chatbox  - Fill in a sentence like `ph!search` - Leave the app (but have it open in multitask) - Go to your library in Spotify and search for a song (stay there for a couple minutes) - Leave Spotify and go back to discord  - When back in the chatbox, immediately tap “send” continuesly - Observe
